title: Bite of Vengeance
description: My opponent thinks he’s making all the right moves to crush me, but apparently no one ever told him the Queen is the most dangerous piece on the board.I won’t allow him to move me around like a Pawn, despite the emotional blow he dealt me by using one of my mates against me.I won’t give up on my mates.I won’t give up on my blood oath.I won’t give up on me.He’ll never take away the grit and determination that burns within me as the last of the Van Helsings.He chose the wrong woman to oppose, and I’ll make sure his next move on the board is his last.***Bite of Vengeance is the third book in the Blood Oath series. It is a reverse harem, paranormal romance. If you love enemies to romance, men that only become soft for their girl, dark secrets, sassy and strong heroines, plus forbidden love– look no further.DARK IMAGINARIUM ACADEMY FEATURES CHARACTERS THAT ARE ALL 18+. THIS IS NOT A HIGH SCHOOL ACADEMY SETTING AND THE CONTENTS ARE INTENDED FOR MATURE AUDIENCES.
author: R.L. Caulder
